Posts.Content: Sep 26, 2010 11:27AM kittykitty10 wrote: hello...i have horners syndrome... no tumors.. neck spurs and arthritis... i feel like i am just dsitting here with no life.. i have always worked.. i am 54.. my eye is droopy. fupil small... bad pain in shoulder/neck and side if head that the horners is on.. the nerolagist said i have to live with it... someone please help with what i should do next so i can get better nto have a life..i have a new grandbaby coming in 7 months and will not even be able to babysit alone..
